setup-worktree: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "try { if ($env:CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV) { conda deactivate; conda deactivate } } catch {} ; if (Test-Path .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1) { .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 } elseif (Test-Path ..\hum2song-mvp\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1) { ..\hum2song-mvp\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 } else { Write-Host 'No venv found' }"
